name: 5.8 "Knights of the Scimitar" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: How did Diane describe the student that liked her?
questions.explanation:
Greek god-like.

	Diane wanted to make Sam jealous so she told him about this student who had a crush on her. She said it was hard to describe how he looked but then said he was Greek god-like.

questions.text: What was the name of the student that had a crush on Diane?
questions.explanation:
Lance.

	Lance was played by J. Eddie Peck. Peck is best known for his role as Cole Howard on "The Young and the Restless".

questions.text: Which Cheers regular was first to become a knight?
questions.explanation:
Cliff.

	Cliff was very excited he got in. He wanted someone else to join but they were not sure they want to join at first.

questions.text: Who said they were voted class clown?
questions.explanation:
Woody.

	Woody went to school in Hanover, Indiana. He was not very smart but was funny.

questions.text: Who did Carla say was the most handsome guy she knew?
questions.explanation:
Robert Redford.

	Sam said he was only talking about guys she met and she told him she did meet Robert Redford. She claimed while he was in Boston for a movie a while back, they had a little fling.

questions.text: What happened when Carla first saw the student that liked Diane?
questions.explanation:
She fainted.

	Carla was amazed at how good looking Lance was. She did kiss him, but that was later on in the episode, not when she first saw him.

6'3".

	Sam gave his height when he found out how tall Lance was. He called Lance 'shorty' because Lance was a little shorter than Sam. One could see by how Sam was acting that he was jealous of Lance.

questions.text: Who was the other Cheers person to become a knight?
questions.explanation:
Norm.

	Norm at first didn't want to join but Cliff convinced him to. He said Cliff had steered him wrong in the past which was why he didn't want to join at first.

questions.text: What was banned at all the Knights of the Scimitar functions?
questions.explanation:
beer.

	Norm was really into the group until they said no beer. Then he quickly left.

questions.text: Did Diane go away with the student?
questions.explanation:
no.

	She told him that she couldn't leave because it would hurt someone. Sam heard this and said, "Please go with someone's blessing." Then Diane kissed Lance to make Sam jealous. Sam said he wasn't jealous and he kissed Diane to show what would make him jealous. Then Carla kissed Lance to show him what would make Sam jealous. Diane told Carla she wasn't a part of what was going on, and Carla replied, "I am now" and went back to kissing Lance.
